types.name: starterTemplate
types.description: Starter template chosen during create document

types.name: command
types.description: The id of a VS Code command

types.name: debounceCount
types.description: Number of times the telemetry event was debounced before emission

types.name: caws_createWorkspaceRepoType
types.description: Type of Git repository provided to the CAWS workspace create wizard

types.name: caws_updateWorkspaceLocationType
types.description: Locality of the CAWS update workspace request (i.e., from the thin client or the local IDE instance)

metrics.name: vscode_executeCommand
metrics.description: Emitted whenever a registered Toolkit command is executed

metrics.name: aws_installCli
metrics.description: Called after attempting to install a local copy of a missing CLI

metrics.name: aws_refreshCredentials
metrics.description: Emitted when credentials are automatically refreshed by the AWS SDK

metrics.name: ssm_createDocument
metrics.description: An SSM Document is created locally

metrics.name: ssm_deleteDocument
metrics.description: An SSM Document is deleted

metrics.name: ssm_executeDocument
metrics.description: An SSM Document is deleted

metrics.name: ssm_openDocument
metrics.description: An SSM Document is opened locally

metrics.name: ssm_publishDocument
metrics.description: SSM Document related metrics for create and update

metrics.name: ssm_updateDocumentVersion
metrics.description: SSM Document related metrics for updating document default version

metrics.name: vscode_activeRegions
metrics.description: Record the number of active regions at startup and when regions are added/removed

metrics.name: vscode_viewLogs
metrics.description: View the VSCode IDE logs

metrics.name: aws_showExplorerErrorDetails
metrics.description: Called when getting more details about errors thrown by the explorer

metrics.name: aws_showRegion
metrics.description: Records a call to add a region to the explorer

metrics.name: aws_hideRegion
metrics.description: Records a call to remove a region from the explorer

metrics.name: sam_detect
metrics.description: Called when detecting the location of the SAM CLI

metrics.name: cdk_explorerDisabled
metrics.description: Called when expanding the CDK explorer is disabled

metrics.name: cdk_explorerEnabled
metrics.description: Called when the CDK explorer is enabled

metrics.name: cdk_appExpanded
metrics.description: Called when the CDK explorer is expanded

metrics.name: cdk_provideFeedback
metrics.description: Called when providing feedback for CDK

metrics.name: cdk_help
metrics.description: Called when clicking on help for CDK

metrics.name: cdk_refreshExplorer
metrics.description: Called when refreshing the CDK explorer

metrics.name: sam_attachDebugger
metrics.description: Called after trying to attach a debugger to a local sam invoke

metrics.name: sam_openConfigUi
metrics.description: Called after opening the SAM Config UI

metrics.name: caws_createWorkspace
metrics.description: Create a CAWS Development Workspace

metrics.name: caws_updateWorkspaceSettings
metrics.description: Update properties of a CAWS development workspace

metrics.name: caws_updateDevfile
metrics.description: Trigger a devfile update on a CAWS development workspace

metrics.name: caws_localClone
metrics.description: Clone a CAWS code repository locally

metrics.name: caws_connect
metrics.description: Connect to a CAWS development workspace
